name: Hollow Steel
description:
First Person action game with an emphasis on speedy traversal of the level set in a cybepunk ninja fantasy world. Beat an  open-ended level by killing the enemies as fast as possible using sword attacks, throws and dashes.

Team consisted of seven members.

Team Lead/Programmer - Daniel Zammit

AI Programmer - Connor

Designer - Josh Heron

Producer - Rory 

Character Artist - Ranald

Environment Artist - Brett

Prop Artist - Matthew
